org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity
Class AeActivityImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeAbstractBpelObject
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.AeActivityImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeActivity, IAeBpelObject, IAeExecutableBpelObject, IAeExecutableQueueItem, IAeFunctionFactory, IAeLocatableObject, IAeNamespaceContext, IAeVisitable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeActivityAssignImpl, AeActivityCompensateImpl, AeActivityEmptyImpl, AeActivityFlowImpl, AeActivityIfImpl, AeActivityPickImpl, AeActivityRethrowImpl, AeActivityScopeImpl, AeActivitySequenceImpl, AeActivitySuspendImpl, AeActivityTerminateImpl, AeActivityThrowImpl, AeActivityValidateImpl, AeActivityWaitImpl, AeLoopActivity, AeLoopControl, AeWSIOActivityImpl
public abstract class AeActivityImpl
extends AeAbstractBpelObject
implements IAeActivity

Base class for bpel activity implementations.

Method Detail

terminateEarly

public void terminateEarly()
                    throws AeBusinessProcessException
Terminates the activity as a result of the early termination of a looping container. The object terminates all of its enclosed children but completes normally.

Specified by:
terminateEarly in interface IAeActivity
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

getConvertedResourceLockPaths

protected java.util.Set getConvertedResourceLockPaths()
If the activity is nested within a parallel forEach then we may need to convert one or more of its variable paths to include instance information if those variables are themselves declared within a parallel forEach.

                      throws AeBusinessProcessException

isJoinConditionTrue

protected boolean isJoinConditionTrue()
                               throws AeBusinessProcessException
Returns true if the join condition evaluates to true. If the join condition doesn't evaluate to true and we're not suppressing errors then we'll get a fault.

Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

isStatusOfIncomingLinksKnown

protected boolean isStatusOfIncomingLinksKnown()
Returns true if the status of all incoming links is known.

Overrides:
isStatusOfIncomingLinksKnown in class AeAbstractBpelObject
Returns:
true if all link statuses are known, false if at least 1 is unknown

addSourceLink

public void addSourceLink(AeLink aLink)
The link is stored in a collection of source links that will be evaluated when this activity completes.

Parameters:
aLink -

addTargetLink

public void addTargetLink(AeLink aLink)
The link is stored in a collection of target links that will be evaluated before this activity is allowed to start. The status of all of an activities incoming links must be known before an activity is allowed to start.

Parameters:
aLink -

isSuppressJoinConditionFailure

public boolean isSuppressJoinConditionFailure()
Checks the activity def to see if it defines the suppress attribute flag. If not, it'll default to the super's impl.

Specified by:
isSuppressJoinConditionFailure in interface IAeBpelObject

objectCompleted

protected void objectCompleted()
                        throws AeBusinessProcessException
Processes any outgoing links (aka source links) and then signals the engine that this activity is complete which should in turn notify its parent.

Overrides:
objectCompleted in class AeAbstractBpelObject
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

evaluateLinks

protected IAeFault evaluateLinks()
                          throws AeBusinessProcessException
Evaluate all of our links. The first part of this evaluation is done prior to our state changing since we want to be able to be able to handle any transitionCondition errors as errors on the source activity as opposed to the target activity.

Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

executeJoinConditionExpression

protected boolean executeJoinConditionExpression(IAeExpressionDef aExpressionDef)
                                          throws AeBusinessProcessException
Executes a join condition expression that we expect to return a Boolean. Any other return value from the evaluation will result in an exception being thrown since there is something terribly wrong.

Parameters:
aExpressionDef -
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

notifyProcessOfLinkChanges

protected void notifyProcessOfLinkChanges()
Notifies the process of the link state change (if any). In the event that a link became true then its target activity will execute or at least becomes eligible to execute. If the link is false then the target will go dead path.

getChildrenForStateChange

public java.util.Iterator getChildrenForStateChange()
Description copied from interface: IAeBpelObject
Returns an Iterator for the bpel object's child objects which participate in the state change propagation. For structured activities, this merely returns an Iterator for the child activity or activities. In some cases though, like Scope, we're returning objects in addition to the single child activity. This is because scope needs to propagate the

Specified by:
getChildrenForStateChange in interface IAeBpelObject
Returns:
Iterator containing IAeBpelObjets
See Also:
IAeBpelObject.getChildrenForStateChange()

setState

public void setState(AeBpelState aNewState)
              throws AeBusinessProcessException
Overridden here to provide the additional behavior of setting all of the outbound link statuses to false if the state we're moving to is the dead path.

Specified by:
setState in interface IAeBpelObject
Overrides:
setState in class AeAbstractBpelObject
Throws:

updateLinks

private void updateLinks()
Some states result in an activity's links automatically getting set to false. For example, a faulted state or terminated state.

childrenAreDone

protected boolean childrenAreDone()
Returns true if all of the activity's child objects are done executing or are dead paths. This method relies on getChildrenForStateChange() to return an Iterator for all of the child objects that we want to check.

setAllOtherToDeadPath

protected void setAllOtherToDeadPath(IAeBpelObject aChild,
                                     java.util.Iterator aIterator)
                              throws AeBusinessProcessException
Walks the Iterator setting all of the bpel objects to dead path except for the one passed in. This is used by activities that allow only a single child to execute and set the others to dead path (like switch's cases)

Parameters:
aChild -
aIterator -
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

getEngineConfiguration

protected IAeEngineConfiguration getEngineConfiguration()
Convenience accessor for the IAeEngineConfiguration.
